thread.title: A pleasant journey at the center of Manhattan
thread.title_full: A pleasant journey at the center of Manhattan - Review of Hotel 32 32, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: vaconn2002
title: A pleasant journey at the center of Manhattan
text: After reviewing lots of hotels on internet, I found Hotel 32 has the BIGGEST room I can get in Manhattan. And It's actually more than just big! There are a kitchen, a bath tub, and even a sofa to invite local friends. COZY. I am absolutely willing to recommend Hotel 32 to anyone who wants to stay at the heart of Manhattan.
